thread.title: Comment on ‘The Voice’ 2017 Judges – Season 12 by Daniel
thread.title_full: Comment on ‘The Voice’ 2017 Judges – Season 12 by Daniel

author: Daniel
title: Comment on ‘The Voice’ 2017 Judges – Season 12 by Daniel
text: Share Tweet Follow 'The Voice' 2017 Judges - Season 12 Season 12 of The Voice begins tonight, with Carson Daly returning once again as host. In addition, some of your favorite judges have returned to the show. This season, the blind auditions will be shown in five episodes, as each of the coaches chooses their initial teams. Miley Cyrus has left the show for this season as a coach, but she is set to return for season 13 thus far. In the meantime, a fan-favorite judge has come back. Get all the details on each of this season's judges, along with their latest news, in our season 12 judges' gallery. Also, find out what celebrities are teaming up with each of the coaches on the show this season as advisers. (Photo by: Trae Patton/NBC) Next Image: The Voice - Season 12 Lauren Weigle is a senior contributor to Heavy specializing in celebrity and reality television. She has an extensive background in entertainment, fashion, PR, lifestyle and journalism. Follow her on Twitter @NYCPRTeam . February 27, 2017 7:38 pm
